text: I goes to the store yesterday to buyed some milk.
I went to the store yesterday to buy some milk.
She not know where the keys is.
She doesn't know where the keys are.
He do his homework every night.
He does his homework every night.
They was playing outside when it start rain.
They were playing outside when it started to rain.
We eating dinner when the phone ring.
We were eating dinner when the phone rang.
